name: Natural_Evolution_Buildings
title: Natural Evolution Buildings
author: TheSAguy
description: Add some very useful buildings to combat the Enemy threat, as changed by N.E. Enemies and Expansion. Part of the N.E. Mods, but can be used as Standalone. Please visit home page for more details.
